title: Zrno Bio Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan, Macrobiotic, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Bakery, Croatian
description: Certified organic vegan restaurant, opened Jun 2013 replacing the previous restaurant Nova. Meals are based on macrobiotic principles with vegetables sourced from its own organic farm as well as other local producers. Smoothies, shakes, teas, coffee and desserts available. English is spoken and on menu. Air-conditioned and non-smoking.
